tool_description: Search any word from any written language.
name: Glossarium
title: Glossarium

api_list.name: search
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://glossarium.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/search/apple"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "glossarium.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://glossarium.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/search/{lemma}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "glossarium.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
